item.title: 'My youngest child doesn't know what fruit tastes like': Gaza residents on famine
item.description: A UN-backed body says more than half a million people across Gaza are facing "starvation, destitution and death".

item.title: Nigeria deports Chinese scammers in crackdown on 'foreign-led' cyber crime
item.description: A total of 102 deported foreigners have been convicted of "cyber-terrorism and internet fraud" this week.

item.title: US to review all 55 million visas to check if holders broke rules
item.description: A US state department official says US visa holders will face "continuous vetting".

item.title: Sri Lanka's former president Ranil Wickremesinghe arrested
item.description: Ranil Wickremesinghe has been arrested in connection with the alleged misuse of funds, officials said.

item.title: Former Thai PM Thaksin acquitted in royal insult case
item.description: The former PM's lese majeste charge relates to an interview he did with a South Korean newspaper years ago.
